clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in ovarian cancer lung cancer and macular degeneration

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Darbepoetin alfa is combined with Squalamine
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Erythropoietin is combined with Squalamine
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Peginesatide is combined with Squalamine
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Methoxy polyethylene glycol epoetin beta is combined with Squalamine
The therapeutic efficacy of Picosulfuric acid can be decreased when used in combination with Squalamine
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Pamidronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Zoledronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Alendronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Ibandronate
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Clodronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Risedronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Etidronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Tiludronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Incadronic acid
The therapeutic efficacy of BCG vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Squalamine
The therapeutic efficacy of Typhoid vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Squalamine
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Dicoumarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Phenindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Warfarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Phenprocoumon
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Acenocoumarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with 4 hydroxycoumarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Coumarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with R warfarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Ethyl biscoumacetate
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Fluindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Clorindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Diphenadione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Tioclomarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Squalamine is combined with S Warfarin
The therapeutic efficacy of Lactulose can be decreased when used in combination with Squalamine
The therapeutic efficacy of Vibrio cholerae CVD 103 HgR strain live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Squalamine
